dict.acceptation: 方式，方法，做法；态度，样子，举止；礼貌，规矩；风俗，习惯，惯例，生活方式；

sent.orig: They fish in all manner of waters with all manner of nets.
sent.trans: 他们在大江小河里用各种鱼网来捕鱼。

sent.orig: The appreciation is one manner, is manner which one kind is from heart envies.
sent.trans: 欣赏是一种态度，是一种发自内心羡慕的态度。

sent.orig: There was an ease in his manner-a gay and light manner it was.
sent.trans: 他的态度从容大方――那是一种轻松，愉快的态度。

sent.orig: Article 306 Packing of Cargo in Prescribed Manner The consignor shall pack the cargo manner.
sent.trans: 第三百零六条托运人应当按照约定的方式包装货物。

sent.orig: They are Quality Maxim, Quantity Maxim, Relevance Maxim, and Manner Maxim.
sent.trans: 包括了质量准则、数量准则、关系准则、方式准则。
